title: The loyal incendiary, or, The generous boutefieu a poem occasioned by the report of the owners bravely setting fire to the Rye House, as the King came from Newmarket.
author: Pordage, Samuel, 1633-1691?
publisher: Printed and sold by Walter Davis ...,
notes: Written by Samuel Pordage. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
